title: Thesaurus Catecheticus, Sive Decades Duae De-Viginti Problematum
creator: Förster, Johann
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Förster, Johann: Thesaurus Catecheticus, Sive Decades Duae De-Viginti Problematum  Partim Theōrētikōn: partim praktikōn: Ex quinq[ue] Catecheseos Lutheranea partibus, Distinctis disputationum exercitiis explicatae atque ventilatae, In Electorali ad Albim Academia ; Comentatio tam Docentibus quam Discentibus, tum in Scholis, tum in Ecclesia utilis. Wittebergae  Berlin 1614
